hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4-Hour Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a period of low volatility (Bollinger Band Width < 0.02) on the 4-hour chart during a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-period average will lead to a continuation move of at least 3% within the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Neutral regimes often feature range compression before directional moves. Bollinger Band squeezes identify periods of low volatility that typically precede high-volatility breakouts. Volume confirmation filters out false breakouts. The current market state (BTC failing at $90K, trading in narrow range) suggests accumulation of potential energy for a directional move.
entry_conditions: Price closes above upper Bollinger Band
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.stop_loss: 1.5% below entry price OR close back inside Bollinger Bands

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout fails to sustain >3% move within 12 hours OR more than 40% of signals result in immediate reversal back into the bands.
